item.title: Autoconnect to NetworkManager VPN on systemd based system
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Here is small post with instructions how to setup auto connect to VPN. Of course you can probably figure out all this yourself, but what if you are lazy?

item.title: The Internet Defense League
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description:
The Internet Blackout was just the beginning. Together, our websites and personal networks can mobilize the planet to defend the internet from bad laws & monopolies. Are you in?

Join Internet Defence League at internetdefenseleague.org
